text: the United States on Thursday drop a
massive non nuclear bomb on what the
Pentagon said was an Islamic state
tunnel complex in Afghanistan the bomb
is called a GPU 43 /b massive ordnance
air blast but it's also known as the
mother of all bombs and it has never
been used in combat before the bomb
contains ten tons of high explosives and
is so large it has to be dropped from
the rear of a cargo plane a handful of
similar bombs had been used by the US
before to destroy caves believed to be
hideouts of the Taliban and al Qaeda
Thursday's strike targeted an area near
the Pakistan border it was unclear
whether any militants or civilians were
killed President Trump
briefly addressed the strike at the
White House another really another
successful job did you authorize it sir
everybody knows exactly what happened so
and what I do is I authorize my military
we have the 20 1,500 pound bomb includes
a satellite guidance system to help it
get closer to its target instead of just
dropping unguided it detonates six feet
above the ground sending a wave of fire
that obliterates everything within a
1,000 yard radius
the air force developed the Moab in 2002
and 2003 as part of the Iraq Wars
shock-and-awe strategy it produced
fourteen of these bombs two of which
were shipped to the Persian Gulf but by
the time they arrived officials decided
they no longer needed to deploy such
massive force
[Music]
